jcr:content.jcr:title: Girls Program Aide Training Weekend- C - Session B

data.details:
Girls Program Aide Training Weekend- C - Session b
Grades: 6, 7, 8

Program Aides, also known as PAs, are Girl Scouts who plan and lead activities and events for younger girls. This training weekend enables girls to explore their leadership through participation in hands-on activities, skill building, and reflection. We ask that you please attend the entire weekend in order to participate and become a certified for the Program Aide trainer. If you cannot attend the complete weekend which includes overnight camping from Friday to Sunday, we kindly ask you to reschedule for a weekend when you can. 

* This event is for 2016 registered Girl Scouts, and registered & approved adult volunteers. 
* For safety and supervision reasons, troops and individuals are not permitted to bring non-Girl Scouts or siblings. 
* Girl/adult ratios must be followed unless otherwise indicated in the program description. Adults are expected to stay on the premises and in some cases, help girls during the event.

$40/girl, $25/adult
Contact: Brittany McCallister 904.389.3071
